{"id":497974031,"lang":"java","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1621929085,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/497974031/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Consecutive Characters","memory":"37.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maxPower(String s) {\n        if(s.length()==1)\n            return 1;\n        char prev=s.charAt(0);\n        int count=1;\n        int maxCount=1;\n        for(int i=1;i<s.length();i++)\n        {\n            if(s.charAt(i)==prev)\n               { count++;\n               maxCount=Math.max(count,maxCount);}\n            else\n                {\n                 count=1;\n                 prev=s.charAt(i);}\n        }\n        \n        return maxCount;\n            \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"consecutive-characters"}
